body: `path` is a `const string&`, so moving it has no effect. If you want to avoid a copy, you need to take `path` as a (by-value) `string` or a `string&&`.
body_html: path is a const string&, so moving it has no effect. If you want to avoid a copy, you need to take path as a (by-value) string or a string&&.
